Phasellus vitae magna id tortor dignissim fringilla at posuere lacus. Etiam aliquet elit id ipsum pulvinar faucibus. Integer semper varius nisi at fringilla. The app Yuni is made for VITAM, the company that runs the canteens on the Tu/e campus. It allows the VITAM to communicate information about the different daily menus to the students and staff who visit the canteen. The visitors can track their favourite menu items and see where the closed canteens are. They can leave and read reviews on canteens and dishes as well as seeing general information about canteens, including opening times. The app will always start on the list tab of this page. You can navigate via the top bar to access either the map or the list section where you can select a canteen to view. If you need any help, come to this section for information on how to use the app. If you click on a canteen it will open on this information page. You can view the reviews and description of the canteen, as well as opening hours and the latest reported busyness. the_app_yuni_is_made_for_vitam_the_company_that_runs_the_canteens_on_the_tu_e_campus_it_allows_the_vitam_to_communicate_information_about_the_different_daily_menus_to_the_students_and_staff_who_visit_the_canteen_the_visitors_can_track_their_favourite_menu_items_and_see_where_the_closed_canteens_are_they_can_leave_and_read_reviews_on_canteens_and_dishes_as_well_as_seeing_general_information_about_canteens_including_opening_times_the_app_will_always_start_on_the_list_tab_of_this_page_you_can_navigate_via_the_top_bar_to_access_either_the_map_or_the_list_section_where_you_can_select_a_canteen_to_view_if_you_need_any_help_come_to_this_section_for_information_on_how_to_use_the_app_if_you_click_on_a_canteen_it_will_open_on_this_information_page_you_can_view_the_reviews_and_description_of_the_canteen_as_well_as_opening_hours_and_the_latest_reported_busyness_app_yuni_is_made_for_vitam_the_company_that_runs_the_canteens_on_the_tu_e_campus_it_allows_the_vitam_to_communicate_information_about_the_different_daily_menus_to_the_students_and_staff_who_visit_the_canteen_the_visitors_can_track_their_favourite_menu_items_and_see_where_the_closed_canteens_are_they_can_leave_and_read_reviews_on_canteens_and_dishes_as_well_as_seeing_general_information_about_canteens_including_opening_times_the_app_will_always_start_on_the_list_tab_of_this_page_you_can_navigate_via_the_top_bar_to_access_either_the_map_or_the_list_section_where_you_can_select_a_canteen_to_view_if_you_need_any_help_come_to_this_section_for_information_on_how_to_use_the_app_if_you_click_on_a_canteen_it_will_open_on_this_information_page_you_can_view_the_reviews_and_description_of_the_canteen_as_well_as_opening_hours_and_the_latest_reported_busyness Name Description Add Dish Upload Photo string>
